title: Snow Day Malzahar graphical bug... literally
body: When recalling as Snow Day Malzahar {{champion:90}}  the poro he summons during the recall has no texture and remains a blue color, it's about a Xerath kind of blue.{{champion:101}} .  The voidlings that spawn from his passive do not have this graphical error however. During the recall, the lost texture persists through it's transformation to a voidling.

replies.body: This should be resolved next patch!
All i want when i play Malz is to see him play with that little VoidPoro when i recall, but lately this blue thing has ruined my moods :( please give me VoidPoro back he is my friend
Looks like we're good to go for next patch. :3
Yes! I get to play Snowday Malzahar again! I've had to switch between Djinn and Overlord, its been really negatively effecting my performance ;D
